word: There are souls who are trembling in unbelief. They ask, \93How can I know that God is reconciled to me? How can I be assured that He loves and pardons me?\94 It is not for you, dear youth, to make yourselves just with God. Jesus invites you to come to Him with all your burdens and perplexities. . . . Accept the promise and the provision that God has made. . . . Look away from self to Jesus; for in Christ the character of the Father is revealed.
